sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col} from 'react-grid-system' import Header from './layout/Header' import VerticallyCenteredModal from './layout/VerticallyCenteredModal' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import {IMG_BASE_URL} from './strings' import RecommendedCards from './layout/RecommendedCards'; const MovieDetails = () => { const location = useLocation() const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); return (

{location.state.original_title}

({location.state.release_date.slice(0, 4)})
  • {location.state.vote_average}
  • / {location.state.vote_count} votes

  • Popularity: {Math.round(location.state.popularity)}

Language:

{location.state.original_language}

Release date:

{location.state.release_date}

Description:

{location.state.overview}
setModalShow(false)}/>
) } export default MovieDetails
